name: AssociateAssetWithCampaign
description:
Associate a specified asset with a HubSpot campaign.

This tool is used to link various asset types such as forms, lists, or emails with a specific HubSpot campaign. It's useful for managing and organizing marketing efforts across different platforms.

parameters.name: campaign_unique_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID. Essential for associating an asset with the correct campaign.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Specify the asset type to associate with the campaign. Allowed values are FORM, OBJECT_LIST, and EXTERNAL_WEB_URL.

value_schema.description:
The type of asset
Important: Currently, only the following asset types are available for association via the API: FORM, OBJECT_LIST, EXTERNAL_WEB_URL

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the asset to be associated with a campaign. This should be provided as a string.
